import React, { Component } from 'react' import Navbar2 from './Navbar2' import Footer from './Footer' import { Breadcrumb } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../CSS/style.css' export default class Services extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={ name:'', email:'', contact:'', address:'', category:'Indian', restaurant:'', userId:'', list:[], //for category list2:[], // for userId session reslist:[] // for restaurant } this.state.list2= JSON.parse( localStorage.getItem('login')); this.state.userId = this.state.list2[0].id //to fetch categories fetch('http://localhost:8080/categories').then((resp) => { resp.json().then((data) => { this.setState({ list:data }) }) }) } update= (e) => { this.setState({ category:e.target.value }) console.log("http://localhost:8080/categories/" + this.state.category + "/restaurant") //fetching restaurant fetch(`http://localhost:8080/categories/${this.state.category}/restaurant`).then((resp) => { resp.json().then((data) => { console.log(data) this.setState({ reslist:data }) }) }) } render() { return (
Home

this.setState({name: e.target.value})} required/>
this.setState({email: e.target.value})} required/>
this.setState({contact: e.target.value})} required/>
this.setState({address: e.target.value})} required/>
) } }
